revised_title: Thermal Turbulence and Heat Transport: A Statistical Analysis
tldr: This article presents a statistical analysis of the turbulent processes responsible for heat transport in a fluid between horizontal surfaces. The authors determine the transport spectrum and eddy conductivity, providing insights into the macroscopic consequences and mean amplitudes of turbulent fluctuations. The study contributes to understanding thermal turbulence and its role in geophysical and astrophysical convection.
